with an orthogonal matrixU ∈Rm×m with column vectorsui, i= 1,...,m ,
and an orthogonal matrix V ∈Rn×n with column vectors vj, j = 1,...,n .
Moreover, Σ is an m×nmatrix with Σii = σi ⩾0 and Σij = 0, i̸= j.
The diagonal entries σi, i= 1,...,r , of Σ are called the singular values, singular values
ui are called the left-singular vectors, and vj are called the right-singular left-singular vectors
